text: Electronic Voting Machines (EVMs) arrived here in the district on Friday. The EVMs that consist of 1,832 control units, and 2,237 ballot units arrived here from East Champaran and Shekpura districts of Bihar. Earlier, the strongroom that housed the EVMs was inspected by Collector K.Vivekanandan. According to the administration, a 24 hour police force has been placed to guard the strongroom.
title: EVMs arrive in Dharmapuri
